Steve Ballmer announced the latest changes Wednesday in an e-mail to Microsoft employees. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," Steve Ballmer wrote. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. Steve Ballmer also disclosed that Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft.
